name: Trinium Wars
description:
From bare wastelands to fresh forests, Trinium Wars offers diverse landscapes, exciting fights with native mutants and an enthralling storyline around the two competing factions. On one side, the Narc, who came to Earth in the quest for a new home and who, with their cat ears, bring a slight fantasy touch to the grim Sci­Fi universe of Trinium Wars. On the other side, the Humans, who had to leave Earth after the nuclear devastation of World War III. After 200 years living in space they are now reclaiming what once belonged to them.

FEATURES

Two unique races! | Play as Humans or Narc, each with unique graphic style
Different regions | Enjoy unique environments, from wasteland to green forests
Unique Setting | Dive into the post-apocalyptic / Sci Fi story with hundreds of quests
Base-building mode: | players can build various buildings in their base to produce equipment, potions and even skills
Player-driven economy | Sell your self-made armory and weaponry in the Auction House
Battlefield mode | exciting PVP MOBA-style matches in special battle arenas (unlocked at level 10)
